tutor.name: Aqsa Perwez
tutor.bio: Hallo! I'm Aqsa, a certified German language instructor with over 8 years of experience teaching students from around the world. Born and raised in Munich, I combine traditional teaching methods with modern, interactive techniques to make learning German engaging and effective. Whether you're preparing for exams, relocating to Germany, or simply passionate about languages, I'm here to guide you every step of the way.

courses.description: Perfect for complete beginners. Learn basic vocabulary, pronunciation, and essential grammar to introduce yourself and handle everyday situations.
Expand your vocabulary and grammar. Communicate in routine tasks and describe your background, immediate environment, and needs.
Handle most situations while traveling in German-speaking countries. Produce simple connected text on familiar topics and discuss personal interests.
Understand complex texts and interact fluently with native speakers. Express yourself on a wide range of topics with clarity and detail.
Express yourself fluently and spontaneously. Use German flexibly for social, academic, and professional purposes with precision.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Anna's teaching style is incredible! I went from struggling with basic sentences to having full conversations in just 12 weeks. Her patience and personalized approach made all the difference.

testimonials.name: Carlos Mendez
testimonials.text: I had zero German knowledge before starting. Anna made learning fun and practical. The materials were top-notch, and I loved the flexible scheduling. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: Preparing for my move to Berlin, I needed to reach B2 quickly. Anna's structured approach and real-world practice scenarios got me exam-ready. I passed with flying colors!

testimonials.name: Michael O'Brien
testimonials.text: As a business professional, I needed advanced German for work. Anna tailored the course to my industry needs. Her expertise in both language and culture is unmatched.
